Segment.name: PTD
Segment.comment: To indicate the start of detail information relating to the transfer/resale of a product and provide identifying data

Field.name: ProductTransferTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of product transfer

Field.name: PriceMultiplierQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of price multiplier

Field.name: Multiplier
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ProductTransferMovementTypeCode
Field.comment: To indicate the type of product transfer movement

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PTD02 or PTD03 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PTD04 or PTD05 is present, then the other is required.
